title: SYN FREE MASHED POTATOES
directions: Place the potatoes in a saucepan
Bring to a boil and simmer until soft
Using a potato ricer or masher, mash the potatoes.
Add a little bit of the reserved stock at a time, until you have a nice smooth mash potato (approx ½ cup/120mls of the reserved stock in total)
Add the yoghurt and mix till smooth and creamy
Season well with salt and black pepper.
ingredients: 900g/2lbs of potatoes, peeled and cubed - pick a waxy larger variety
½ cup/120 ml of fat free plain yoghurt
